item.title: Uberlution; ECO - PKing!
item.dc:creator: @Uberlution Uberlution
item.description:
@Uberlution wrote:

[CENTER]


[FONT=Fixedsys][B][COLOR=Purple]Links[/COLOR]
[/B][FONT=Lucida Console][URL=http://“http://uberlution.co.uk”]Website / Forums[/URL]
[URL=http://“http://uberlution.co.uk/Client.zip”]Client Download[/URL]

[B][COLOR=Purple]About[/COLOR]
[/B]Welcome to the thread advertising this brand new server Uberlution! Uberlution was started to bring entertainment for those people who love PKing! The goal is to bring the best enjoyment we can and to do this we allow the players to choose the content we add to the game, you suggest it and we will implant it!
[/FONT][/FONT]
[FONT=Fixedsys][FONT=Lucida Console][FONT=Fixedsys][FONT=Lucida Console][B][COLOR=Purple]Features
[/COLOR][/B]VPS hosted;
Player killing achievments w/ shop;
EP drop system;
Target system;
Pets w/ Member Only Pets;
PKing highscores in-game;
Quick prayers & curses;
Great switching and combat formula;
Stauettes as drops as way to gain coins w/ Coin Shop;
‘Item Points’ gained from a player kill or boss kill;
‘Item Points’ shop to purchase some of the best items;
[/FONT][/FONT][/FONT][/FONT]
[FONT=Fixedsys][FONT=Lucida Console][FONT=Fixedsys][FONT=Lucida Console][FONT=Fixedsys][FONT=Lucida Console][FONT=Fixedsys][FONT=Lucida Console][B][COLOR=Purple]Pictures

[/COLOR][/B]Starter(You also recieve a bank full of goods!);

Awesome Statistic Tracker;

Player Killing achievments;

Plenty of shops to buy what you need;

Choose your own levels!;

Amazing clan chat so you can create a PKing clan;

Settings;

Item points shop(These disappear upon death)

Coins shop(Items go to bank on death)

Coins shop

[/FONT][/FONT][/FONT][/FONT][/FONT][/FONT][/FONT][/FONT][LEFT]

[COLOR=Red][B]AND PLENTY MORE SHOPS TO VIEW IN-GAME![/B][/COLOR]
[/LEFT]
[FONT=Fixedsys][FONT=Lucida Console][FONT=Fixedsys][FONT=Lucida Console][FONT=Fixedsys][FONT=Lucida Console][FONT=Fixedsys][FONT=Lucida Console]
